properties.name: spring.session.redis.cleanup-cron
properties.description: Cron expression for expired session cleanup job. Only supported when repository-type is set to indexed. Not supported with a reactive session repository.

properties.name: spring.session.redis.configure-action
properties.description: The configure action to apply when no user-defined ConfigureRedisAction or ConfigureReactiveRedisAction bean is present.

properties.name: spring.session.redis.flush-mode
properties.description: Sessions flush mode. Determines when session changes are written to the session store. Not supported with a reactive session repository.

properties.name: spring.session.redis.namespace
properties.description: Namespace for keys used to store sessions.

properties.name: spring.session.redis.repository-type
properties.description: Type of Redis session repository to configure.

properties.name: spring.session.redis.save-mode
properties.description: Sessions save mode. Determines how session changes are tracked and saved to the session store.
